Question.Subject: i want to know if these are ebay scams?
Question.Content:

XOXOTHNXX
Question.ChosenAnswer: looks fine to me especially since their feedback is high.

Answer.Content: looks fine to me especially since their feedback is high.
They look good to me. Their feed back is good but I would only order from a place from the U.S. You never know what can happen between Hong Kong and here.
